channel.title: Make hidden owner?
channel.description: how do you make yourself hidden owner?

item.title: Make hidden owner?
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Everything for hidden is usually placed as “player right4”

Sometimes can be hidden admin.

Rarely hidden owner can be “player rights 10” which is found in some sources.

Read full topic

item.title: Make hidden owner?
item.dc:creator: @icebabe11 icebabe11
item.description:
@icebabe11 wrote:

You make that person log out for 20 seconds, open his file from the characters folder change his “player rights” to 4 instead of 1.
When he logs back in, he’s hidden admin.

Read full topic

item.title: Make hidden owner?
item.dc:creator: @mad_moparscapian mad_moparscapian
item.description:
@mad_moparscapian wrote:

In reapagescape there is a code that is player rights 10 for hidden co-owner but it is basically the same is hidden admin which is player rights 4 i will try and find the code for you

} if (playerRights == 4) { sendMessage("Welcome to (server name here) "); sendMessage("You're a hidden owner dont tell anyone tho..OK!"); sendMessage("Type ::rules for the server rules. Don't say you didn't know them ;]"); sendMessage("You have all the abilities of a normal owner"); sendMessage("Server Created By (player name here)"); // Made by Mad_moparscapian newWelc();

just add that into your login packet

Read full topic

item.title: Make hidden owner?
item.dc:creator: @coolpup2233 coolpup2233
item.description:
@coolpup2233 wrote:

If its already pre-programmed into the server then just make your player rights 4. If they’re not already in the server then I honestly don’t know how to put them in.

Read full topic
